mapper.select: SELECT v.id , v.name , v.address , v.contact , v.email , v.description , v.create_date , v.modify_date , v.status , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = v.create_by) as "create_by" , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = v.modify_by) as "modify_by" FROM vendor v where v.status != #{status}
